item.description:
UPDATE - Essex River Cruise is sending a boat to pick us up. We will depart from Periwinkle's - UPDATE

Lettie's invited us to the North Shore for another loooooong meal with excursions.
Lettie's put a lot of time and energy into arranging this amazing adventure, so please be certain you can join us.

Lettie says:

Hey ya'll, you are all cordially invited on another North Shore Adventure...
I thought it would be wonderful to explore historic, beautiful, and quaint Essex.
Please arrive by 11:15 AM for our 11:30 AM seating for lunch at Periwinkle's Restaurant, a place for GREAT waterside food...fresh native seafood specialties, fine wines and locally microbrewed beers. Since there will still be nice outdoorsy weather I thought we could sit out on the heated wrap-around deck which is right by the Essex River, so I suggest you dress in layers and have rain gear. Even if we sit inside there are still BEAUTIFUL views from every table. There is also a piano for anyone willing to delight us with their talent :-D

Periwinkle's Lunch Menu

Driving directions from Boston S & W:
Rt. 128 North take exit 15 Manchester/Essex, LEFT 3.2 miles to stop sign LEFT on to Rt. 133/Main St. go about 0.4 mile and Periwinkles Restaurant is on the right hand side, parking available.

All commuter rail riders will be chauffered at 11:15 AM from the Manchester-by-the-Sea station to Periwinkle's.
MBTA Link Commuter Rail Schedule

After a yum, yum delicious lunch we have a couple of options:

1. Essex River Cruise is sending the boat to us. We will board from Periwinkle's at 3:15 PM & set sail at 3:30 PM.
Cost: $23 for adults $10 for children
Experience up close the Choate Island film site of "The Crucible" and "Witches of Eastwick" on a nearly two hour narrated cruise. Enjoy the spectacular beauty of New England's famous fall foliage at its peak.Essex River Cruise

2. Stroll along the streets of Essex from 5:30 PM until 6:00 PM visiting antique shops, and historical sites.
Essex History

The following MEMBER GUIDELINES were developed so our events run smoothly.

Our focus is on friendly and respectful gatherings while sharing a delicious meal.
Please be considerate of your fellow diners time by arriving promptly.
Please bring enough cash to pay for your meal, drinks, tip, and tax as well as the appropriate cruise fee.
Please RSVP YES only if you are certain you will attend.
***If you RSVP YES you MUSt add a comment whether you'll arrive via car or train with train number as well as if you'll join for the post meal cruise and or stroll .***
If you choose to travel on the commuter rail from North Station on Sunday the trains are 2101 which leaves at 8:30 AM and arrives in Manchester-by-the-Sea at 9:19 AM and 2105 which leaves at 10:15 AM and arrives in Manchester-by-the-Sea at 11:05 AM.
If your name appears on the event page as a YES after the event and you have not attended the event, it is counted as a NO-SHOW.
If you change your RSVP from a YES to a NO after 11:30am Saturday October 20th, it is counted as a NO-SHOW.
If any guests you've RSVPd for NO-SHOW it will count as if you've NO-SHOWED.
If you are a NO-SHOW for three events you are removed from the group.
NO-SHOWS impact everyone; from you, who could or has been on the wait list to the organizer as well as the restaurant's who staff based on our reservation.
If it is less than twenty-fours from the event and you are not able to attend or are running late, you must text or call me (Tonya) at (617) 445-7549.

If do not contact me it will be counted as if you NO-SHOWED 3 times.

If you're not sure you can attend because you have other unconfirmed plans or uncertain transportation, please RSVP NO with a comment requesting to be placed on wait list.
If this event is full and you wish to attend, please RSVP NO with a comment to be wait listed.
Your feedback is appreciated, so please rate the event and venue by completing the surveys after the events.

group.name: Breakfast, Brunch, Lunch, & Dinner Meetup Group

item.name: Periwinkle's Lunch - Another North Shore Adventure With Lettie
